mod.name: First Items
mod.author: The Forgotten Server
mod.event:
domodlib('firstitems_config')
function onLogin(cid)
if(getPlayerStorageValue(cid, config.storage) > 0) then return true end
for _, id in ipairs(config.items) do doPlayerAddItem(cid, id, 1) end
if(getPlayerSex(cid) == PLAYERSEX_FEMALE) then doPlayerAddItem(cid, 2550, 1) else doPlayerAddItem(cid, 2550, 1) end
setPlayerStorageValue(cid, config.storage, 1) return true end
